definition: blowing in puffs or short intermittent blasts
details:
adjective
- blowing in puffs or short intermittent blasts
= example: blowing in puffs or short intermittent blasts
= synonyms: gusty
- abnormally distended especially by fluids or gas
= synonyms: tumid, intumescent, tumescent, turgid
- being puffed out
= synonyms: bouffant
